title: Security Forces foil infiltration attempts of Indian proxy, kill 30 khawarij
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jul 04 (APP):Security Forces killed 30 khawarij belonging to Indian Proxy Fitna al Khwarij while foiling their infiltration attempt through Pakistan-Afghanistan border in general area Hassan Khel, North Waziristan District.
“Own troops effectively engaged and thwarted Indian sponsored Khawarij’s attempt to infiltrate. As a result of precise and skillful engagement, all thirty Indian sponsored khawarij were sent to hell.
A large quantity of weapons, ammunition & explosives was also recovered from the killed Indian sponsored Khawarij,” said an Inter Services Public Relations (ISPR) issued here Friday.
The security forces demonstrated exceptional professionalism, vigilance & preparedness, and prevented a potential catastrophe, it further said.
The Interim Afghan Government also needs to check and  prevent the use of Afghan soil by “foreign proxies” for orchestrating terrorist activities against Pakistan.
The Security Forces of Pakistan remain resolute and unwavering in their commitment to defend the nation’s frontiers and to eradicate the menace of Indian sponsored terrorism from the country.
